metadata.title: CVE-2021-40812 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) through 2.3.2 has an out-of-bounds readbecause of the lack of certain gdGetBuf and gdPutBuf return value checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5+esm3
libgd3 - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5+esm3').
